      • body

        public FullHttpResponse.Builder body(String content,
                                     Charset charset)
        Sets the request body.

        This method encodes a String content to a byte array using the specified charset, and sets the Content-Length header accordingly.

        Parameters:
        content - request body
        charset - Charset for string encoding.
        Returns:
        this

      • body

        public FullHttpResponse.Builder body(String content,
                                     Charset charset,
                                     boolean setContentLength)
        Sets the response body.

        This method encodes the content to a byte array using the specified charset, and sets the Content-Length header *if* the setContentLength argument is true.

        Parameters:
        content - response body
        charset - Charset used for encoding response body.
        setContentLength - If true, Content-Length header is set, otherwise it is not set.
        Returns:
        this

      • body

        public FullHttpResponse.Builder body(byte[] content,
                                     boolean setContentLength)
        Sets the response body.

        This method encodes the content to a byte array provided, and sets the Content-Length header *if* the setContentLength argument is true.

        Parameters:
        content - response body
        setContentLength - If true, Content-Length header is set, otherwise it is not set.
        Returns:
        this

      • header

        public FullHttpResponse.Builder header(CharSequence name,
                                       Object value)
        Sets the (only) value for the header with the specified name.

        All existing values for the same header will be removed.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the header
        value - The value of the header
        Returns:
        this

      • addHeader

        public FullHttpResponse.Builder addHeader(CharSequence name,
                                          Object value)
        Adds a new header with the specified name and value.

        Will not replace any existing values for the header.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the header
        value - The value of the header
        Returns:
        this

      • build

        public FullHttpResponse build()
        Builds a new full response based on the settings configured in this builder. If validate is set to true:
        • an exception will be thrown if the content length is not an integer, or more than one content length exists
        Returns:
        a new full response
